name: AstroCrash
description:
A 2 in 1 submission to GMTK game jam 2020.

How I believe this fits the theme:

In minigame 1,Bullet Breakdown,the player can control their movement but when and what they shoot is out of their control

In minigame 2,Craft Control,the players body has been fully numbed,and they can't move,so the game centers around manipulating the space around them
